name: Introduction to Proofs
description: The reading and understanding mathematical statements, analyzing definitions and properties, formulating conjectures and generalizations, providing and writing reasonable and precise arguments, modelling and solving proofs. This course is an excellent preparation for MAT157Y1, MAT237Y1, MAT240H1, and other proof-oriented courses. Note: students may take this course concurrently with MAT157Y1 or prior to registering in MAT157Y1.
